stories.text:
Hi Friends, I am engineer with about 12 years of experience in two big tech companies. I want to join early stage startup to experience the early stage hustle of startups.

Like everyone else, I am definitely interested in the early success and equity but also want to grow the company myself.

I wanted to understand what are the kind of things I should consider joining early stage startups and what are typical red-flags to watch out for?

Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: What to consider joining early stage startups

stories.text:
What task manager set-up do you use for work/life/personal projects? At this point I've tried: trello, workflowy, asana and am looking for a set-up that:

1. has multiple views (i.e. daily/monthly, cross project) 2. has a feature for dates/deadlines 3. has a low-cost or free version
stories.title: Ask HN: Project Management for Life
